tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sleep_patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    date DATE,
    total_sleep_hrs DECIMAL,
    sleep_quality_rating INT,
    is_nap_taken BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE SleepPattern (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    sleep_date DATE,
    sleep_start_time TIME,
    sleep_end_time TIME,
    sleep_quality INT
);

CREATE TABLE athletes (
  athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_name STRING,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sleep_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id),
  date DATE,
  hours_slept FLOAT,
  sleep_quality INT
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_data (
  recovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id),
  date DATE,
  workout_intensity INT,
  recovery_rating INT
);
CREATE TABLE Athletes (athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_name VARCHAR, athlete_age INT, athlete_gender VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE SleepPatterns (pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id INT, sleep_date DATE, sleep_duration INT, sleep_quality INT, FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id));
CREATE TABLE RestData (rest_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id INT, rest_date DATE, rest_duration INT, rest_quality INT, FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id));
CREATE TABLE RecoveryStats (recovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id INT, recovery_date DATE, recovery_score INT, FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id));

CREATE TABLE athlete_recovery_metrics (
  recovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  date DATE,
  soreness_level INT,
  recovery_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_goal_tracking (
  goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  goal_type VARCHAR(50),
  goal_description TEXT,
  goal_completion_status BOOLEAN
);
